website_summaries.verdict: Feminine ruching gives these simple shirts a touch of style. Solid colors make them easy to match.
pros: 2-pack of lightweight cotton shirts in several coordinating colors
Solid colors will easily match bottoms from this and other brands
cons: Shirts may be longer than expected

customer_reviews.title: Great little shirts
customer_reviews.text: This tops are so soft and cute. Love that they don't have some design all over them too. Great little shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beth

customer_reviews.title: Durable material and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to have plain shirts for my daughter. They are perfect! Thick material, which is always concerning with white. Super comfy and roomy. My daughter is a small 6 and I feel like she will be able to wear them for a while. I will order more!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Quality fabric. Gave these as a gift with cricut vinyl applied on the front. Turned out super cute! I like the fuller cut. It’s more comfortable for the child in hot humid summer when their clothes aren’t clinging to them!
customer_reviews.author: Stripey Zebra

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful basic shirts! It's nice to have some solid colored options and shirts without words or glitter! These are great!
customer_reviews.author: The Boos Family

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Longer than expected but we’ll get more wear from them. We used these to put our school spirit on them. Perfect fit and style for 2T. Good quality shirts for the price.
customer_reviews.author: randi

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to embroider for my nieces daughter. They were easy to embroider and washed up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Cute
customer_reviews.text: These are well made of thick fabric and are a cute & simple shirt for my 7 year old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Schwemma

customer_reviews.title: May be new without tags
customer_reviews.text: The shirts are cute and look good. Just be aware that these came with no tags and smelling like fabric softener or laundry detergent (which is never the case with brand new clothing).
customer_reviews.author: JFujii

customer_reviews.title: Great simple tee
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are simple yet look nicer then a plan tee. They are soft and semi stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is great for little ones. Soft and the fit is right. Great price
customer_reviews.author: LaPhila

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors and style, will go with shorts or skirts!
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loved them !! Colors were pretty and true to what is advertised and quality is good too! . I ordered a size larger than usual, so she has plenty of room to grow! Very cute with her new skirts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came with a stain
customer_reviews.text: The pink shirt had two bleach stains on it when it came out of the package. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I love Carter's. This arrived quickly and was exactly what I expected. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: P. Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for putting stencils on and they’re perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Stained when I opened the package
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the white shirt came stained right out of the package. I need this for a 100 days of school shirt or else I’d return it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great colors and great fit. Love the scoop net worth a few little gathers at the top, and my daughter is comfy in it. It washes well, too!
customer_reviews.author: Angie  Amos

customer_reviews.title: Great (as usual) from Carter's
customer_reviews.text: Love Carter's clothes and nice to get two basic tees in a set!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat long.
customer_reviews.text: They are somewhat long but its ok. I jist tuck it in and she looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Perfect basic T-shirt for my girls! Love the little detail on sleeves. Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: B. Oosthuizen

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The white shirt had a yellow tint to it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: These 2 shirts wasn’t what I expected but I will keep it. Not the fabric I expected also
customer_reviews.author: YONGHENG

product_meta.title: Carter's Girls' 2-Pack Tees
product_meta.description: Pack of two short sleeve tees crafted in soft cotton jersey with a hi-lo design
feature_bullets: Pack of two short sleeve tees
